title: BP operated BosShelf yard
description: Together with Tukish/ Austrian partner Alfa/ Zeman Celik succesfully  completes several  complex projects in BP  operated BosShelf yard  including excavation,  concrete works, steel  structures, cladding, fit out and MEP works.

title: Lukoil Petrol Station
description: Annual maintenance and service contract with  Lukoil covering Petrol Stations, Petrol Terminal and other facilities

title: Pasha Holding | PMD | FMG
description: Wide range of  construction,  maintenance and  repair works for Pasha  Holding, PMD, FMG including construction  of warehouse, road  construction and and  renovation  works  including HVAC and MEP
